See what’s happening when you’re away. Turn any tablet, computer, or smartphone into a home monitoring camera with the Camio app. Just download Camio on the device you’ll use to record, place it in the area you want to see and press record, then view it from anywhere using any other device.

Already signed up and recording with another device? Download the app or install this extension to view your feed from this device.

Featured in: TechCrunch, Re/Code, WSJ, VentureBeat, and ProductHunt

To learn more, visit www.camio.com
